props.synopsis: New Zealand police briefly joined the search for alleged police killer Dezi Freeman as travel advice for Victoria's north-east eases.

image.altText: Melissa Price speaking in Parliament.

props.synopsis: West Australian MP Melissa Price will replace Jacinta Nampijinpa Price as the shadow minister for defence industry and personnel, after the outspoken senator was sacked for refusing to back her leader.Â

title.children: Ley reshuffles frontbench in wake of Nampijinpa Price saga

image.altText: A man looks out the window of a car. The car's interior is orange. The man is wearing a shirt with 'Versace' on the chest.

image.altText: A man in a blue suit with black hair speaks into a microphone

image.altText: Reece Holder looks up

title.children: Holder hangs on to make 400m semis

image.altText: Alex de Minaur roars in celebration with both arms hoisted

title.children: De Minaur keeps Australia alive in Davis Cup after doubles epic

image.altText: Kangaroos players celebrate a high-five after a goal

props.synopsis: North Melbourne continues its blistering start to the AFLW season as Geelong and St Kilda also record big wins in Round 5.

image.altText: A man slumps to the ground during a rugby league match

image.altText: Woman with dark hair and fringe wears jeans and purple sweater sitting with feet crossed in a bay window. Cushions beside her

image.altText: A woman holds a toddler on her waist and looks at her with a smile

image.altText: close up of platypus head

title.children: More than 100,000 anti-immigration protesters in UK amid scuffles with police

image.altText: A row of PNG soldiers in blue and green uniforms, holding their guns perpindicular to the ground.

image.altText: Mundaring weir satellite composit image

title.children: This dam tells the story about how our new climate reality skews perceptions

image.altText: A sign with a photo of Premier Jacinta Allan with the word banned in a window.
